msg.msgText:
A "MessagingPolicy" composite object can be created using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create MessagingPolicy help imaserver create MessagingPolicy "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create MessagingPolicy "Name=MsgPol1" "Destination=Topic1" "DestinationType=Topic" "ActionList=Publish,Subscribe" "Protocol=JMS"
Configuration items for "MessagingPolicy" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
